head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths LEWIS, FREDERICK H.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths LEWIS, FREDERICK H.

block.p: LEWIS-Frederick H. 93, of Venice, FL, and Kennebunkport, ME, died July 15, in Venice, FL. U.S. Navy veteran of World War II. 25 years director of New York Herald Tribune's Fresh Air Fund. Husband of Virginia Parker Lewis, father to Gordon Phelps Lewis, brother to Mrs. Cameron Mosser. Two granddaughters also survive. Private graveside service. Memorials to Kennebunkport Conservation Trust, Friends of Cape Island, PO Box 7028, Cape Porpoise, ME 04014 or to First Parish Unitarian Universalist Church, Main St., Kennebunk, ME 04043. For information contact Bibber Memorial Chapel, Kennebunk, ME.
